document.full_text: director keith allen on friday defended his film about princess diana's death, amid accusations that it was a one-sided attack on what he called the british "establishment" and entirely funded by mohamed al-fayed.
document.title: diana death documentary maker under fire in cannes
lines_and_colors: director keith allen on friday defended his film about princess diana's death, amid accusations that it was a one-sided attack on what he called the british "establishment" and entirely funded by mohamed al-fayed.
